param.name: showResults

param.name: scoringMethod
param.label: Scoring Method
param.description: Choose which scoring method the Quiz will use.

param.name: emailSubject

param.description: This is the subject of the automated email.

param.name: emailText
param.label: Email Text
param.description: Text describing email field.

param.name: preventMultipleEmail
